alert.note: Alert for Steuben (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 5:50PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A thunderstorm with very heavy rain will impact portions of central Steuben County through 615 PM EDT... At 546 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm with very heavy rain near West Cameron, or 15 miles east of Hornell. HAZARD...Heavy rain that will lead to dangerous travel on I-86 in the Bath area. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Poor Visibility, and ponding of water on I-86 and other roadways. Locations impacted include... Bath, Howard, Thurston, Avoca, Cameron, Savona, West Cameron, Kanona, Cameron Mills and Risingville. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 86/Route 17 between 35 and 40. Interstate 390 near 1. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Heavy rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized ponding of water. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. If you are on I-86, slow down or take the nearest exit until the heavy rain passes.
